description.description: A detailed description of the course.

courseCode.description: The code of the course as it appears in the provider's records.

courseType.description: The type of course, e.g., professional training, preparation for a license exam, academic course, etc.

courseMode.description: The course mode or method of teaching, e.g. online, instructor led, lecture, workshop, etc.

courseLevel.description: The level of the course, e.g., standard, basic, advanced, etc.

courseDuration.description: The duration of the course in hours.

alignment.description: A public resource to which the course is aligned.
